title: Ticket #3007: Plugable collector.
description:
Currently the longest phase in negotiation is the time spent querying the collector to obtain the adds.

When analyzing the flush count in the classad cache the highest flush count is in the negotiator.

Hence it make sense to try and modify it such that a collector+negotiator could live in a single process.
remarks:
2012-Sep-24 14:25:16 by tstclair:
This may also include some minor refactoring work for both testability and will enable some further mods to known bottlenecks. (queries)
